summary: A family gathers for a happy reunion and marriage announcement on Christmas Day at an isolated mansion in the Philippine mountains only to encounter a series of bizarre, demonic, and tragic events.
cast: DJ Perry|Anne Gauthier|Issa Litton|Nic Campos|Jill Palencia|Justin Hoong-Fai Chan|Zeny Sevilla|Kevin Vitug|Elle Velasco|Marife Necesito|Jonas Gruet|Allan Dale Alojipan|Raymond Osme√±a|James Lomahan|Czarina Llane Kwong|Clark Gamul|Shierdan Pamintuan|Alexandra Marie Tan|Crisanto Garrido|Christian Tan|Chris Joshua Tan|Giann Paula Martizano|Stefano Rota|Trixie Dauz
title: Darkest Night
